item.title: Robert Henke Granulator
item.description: Hmm, my granular synthhasn’t quite come together yet, but I’m learning a load. This is a pretty informative (promo) video from Robert Henke/Monolake showcasing his ‘Granulator’ plugin for Ableton Live.If i can get mine to sound anything like that i’ll be stoked!
